amendment.description: To require the Federal Railroad Administration to evaluate regulations that govern the use of locomotive horns at highway-rail grade crossings.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1789 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1789 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Udall CO.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1789 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Udall CO.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1789 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
